parameter.name: summary
parameter.parameter_description: a string to be shown in --help output before the list of options

parameter.name: description
parameter.parameter_description: a string to be shown in --help output after the list of options

function.name: g_key_file_get_double
function.description:
Return value: the value associated with the key as a double.
Since: 2.14
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_load_from_file
function.description:
Loads a key file into an empty KeyFile instance. If the file could not be loaded then a FileError or KeyFileError exception is thrown.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::FileError \throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_get_value
function.description:
Returns the value associated with @key under @group_name.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError in the event the key cannot be found (with the Glib::KeyFileError::KEY_NOT_FOUND code). \throw Glib::KeyFileError in the event that the @group_name cannot be found (with the Glib::KeyFileError::GROUP_NOT_FOUND code).

function.name: g_key_file_get_comment
function.description:
Retrieves a comment above @key from @group_name. If @key is %NULL then @comment will be read from above @group_name. If both @key and @group_name are %NULL, then @comment will be read from above the first group in the file. Use the overrides for a %NULL @key or @group.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_set_comment
function.description:
Places a comment above @key from @group_name. If @key is %NULL then @comment will be written above @group_name. If both @key and @group_name are %NULL, then @comment will be written above the first group in the file.
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_remove_comment
function.description:
Removes a comment above @key from @group_name. If @key is %NULL then @comment will be removed above @group_name. If both @key and @group_name are %NULL, then @comment will be removed above the first group in the file.
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_has_key
function.description:
Looks whether the key file has the key @key in the group @group_name.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_get_string
function.description:
Return value: a newly allocated string or %NULL.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_get_locale_string
function.description:
Return value: a newly allocated string or %NULL.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_get_boolean
function.description:
Return value: the value associated with the key as a boolean.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_get_integer
function.description:
Return value: the value associated with the key as an integer.
Since: 2.6
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_remove_group
function.description:
Removes the specified group, @group_name, from the key file.
\throw Glib::KeyFileError

function.name: g_key_file_remove_key
function.description:
Removes @key in @group_name from the key file.
\throw Glib::KeyFileError
